Login Email Senha
john_doe john@example.com ********
jane_smith jane@example.com ********
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { UserService } from '../services/user/user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-tabela', templateUrl: './tabela.component.html', styleUrls: ['./tabela.component.scss'] }) export class TabelaComponent implements OnInit { dados: any[] = [] nome: any[] = [] email: any[] = [] senha: any[] = [] constructor(private user: UserService) { } ngOnInit() { this.user.autenticarUsuario().subscribe( (res) => { this.dados = res.cadastro this.nome = res.cadastro.nome this.email = res.cadastro.email this.senha = res.cadastro.senha } ) } }
